p:
The best model among obtained models by using two types of selection methods are estimated by QMEAN4 scores
37 and Ramachandran plot
38, 39 . The Ramachandran plots for two models are obtained using PROCHECK
38 and MolProbity
39 . Evaluation of backbone conformation of protein molecule is assayed by Ramachandran plot dividing the percentage of amino acid residues of the model in the allowed and disallowed regions
38, 39 .
